attributes.action: Close pubs, restaurants & hospitality amidst the Coronavirus outbreak.
attributes.additional_details: Put a ban on pubs, clubs, restaurants and hospitality to stem the spread of the virus. These are built up areas which put a lot of people a risk. A lot of the younger population are not taking it seriously.
attributes.background: Keep staff and the community safe by closing all pubs, restaurants & hospitality in order to prevent the spread of the virus. People are not taking it seriously and are adding to the fuel of the spread. Weddings are still going ahead putting hundreds at risk in close proximity.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, clubs and restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here:  https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
